name: Vijay Kumar Myadam
skills_sentences: Azure Active Directory and Privileged Identity Management
Azure DevOps Continuous Integration and Continuous Deployment Pipelines
Azure Key Vault for Secrets and Certificate Management
Azure Sentinel Security Incident and Alert Management
Azure Site Recovery and Disaster Recovery Solutions
HP Server and Storage Installation and Configuration
SQL and PSQL Platform as a Service Databases
Windows Server Operating System Upgrades and Migrations
responsibility_sentences: Configuring and maintaining Azure security controls and organizational security posture
Creating and managing server documentation including infrastructure diagrams and IT asset inventory
Deploying Azure resources using Infrastructure as Code with Terraform and Azure DevOps pipelines
Designing and architecting highly available and disaster recovery solutions on Azure
Designing, implementing, and managing Azure IAAS, PAAS, and SAAS environments
Handling incident management and change requests in production environments
Managing Azure networking solutions including virtual networks, load balancers, VPN gateways, and ExpressRoute
Migrating virtual machines from legacy hardware to Azure cloud using Azure Site Recovery and Azure Migrate
Optimizing Azure cloud costs and capacity planning
Performing server security audits, system backups, and disaster recovery procedures
